THE STATION

 Nothing to report.

  • Welcome to THE STATION, a skeleton of a game made for the Web Development course of BCIT's CST program.

    To view the controls, press the ? key.

  • To move around, use the “Vim Keys” HJKL. H & L move left and right, while J & K move down and up.

    To save your game, press S. To open a previously-saved game, press O.

    To access a developer “Wish Menu,” press W.
